judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeeoy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Peii Curiam,
Order of the Superior Court affirmed. Mr. Justice Eagen dissents.
opinions.author: Peii Curiam,

attorneys: Linda, Conley, Assistant District Attorney, with her Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorney, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Davis, Appellant.
Argued November 20, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeeoy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Rudolph S. Pallastrone, for appellant.
Linda, Conley, Assistant District Attorney, with her Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorney, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
May 4, 1973:
